title: Ena Zou
text:
Hi! My name is Ena and I’m a senior at UCLA studying Statistics & Data Science. My current interests lie in exploring how artificial intelligence can be leveraged in data transparency, fashion, and music tech. I recently started working at Superfan, a music social media app that uses AI and classification techniques to create meaningful connections among Spotify users.
Some of my other passions include entrepreneurship and fashion. At 16 I started my own clothing company, Reverie, a line of 12 ready to wear pieces. With the emergence of AI, NFTs, and the metaverse, I am also interested in how fashion design can be a personalized experience.
And when I’m not in class or working, I’m likely running! I ran the Amsterdam Marathon in 2023 and plan on completing the Los Angeles Marathon in 2024.
My full CV can be found here

title: Ena Zou
text:
Things I’ve been up to…


Predicting U.S. Car Prices  Identified significant factors in determining car prices for Geely Auto to project pricing dynamics for their automobiles. Performed multiple linear regression, feature engineering, and validation through regression diagnostics to ensure the robustness of the model and reliability of its forecasts.
The Right Way to Play Wordle  Investigated optimal starting words, strategies for subsequent guesses, and awareness of duplicate letters to enhance players’ chances of success in the game.
Olympics: Past and Future  Predicted medal counts for each country at the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics, with a focus on factors like past Olympic performance, economic growth (measured by GDP), Human Development Index (HDI), and any advantage gained from hosting the Olympics in their home country.
Forecasting Severity of U.S. Car Crashes Performed data cleaning, manipulation, feature engineering, and machine learning model selection to build a classification model predicting the severity of a car crash, contributing to road safety efforts.

title: Ena Zou
text:
Where have I worked?


 Founder & CEO @Reverie   Designed a collection of 12 clothing pieces, oversaw production processes with a manufacturer, formulated marketing materials and strategies, and launched an E-commerce website to establish the brand’s online presence. Generated over $1,000 in sales during the first year of active business operations, and successfully collaborated with influencer Emily Mariko
 Technology Consultant Intern @Ernst & Young   Implemented and designed Generative AI solutions for accounting, leveraging OpenAI, Langchain, and PandasAI to detect discrepancies between sub-ledgers and general ledgers. Created heatmaps and synthesized end-to-end GenAI pipelines for GenAI’s finance marketing client pitches.
 Data Engineer Intern @Rubrik   Developed lead and account scoring models to enhance customer assessment processes by engineering data pipelines and performing data analysis with SQL and Snowflake. Executed ARIMA time series analysis in R to bolster the booking projection model.

title: ENA ZOU
text:

ENA ZOU
